code: @Override protected String[] parseUri(DynamicAwareEntry entry) {     // camel-netty4 parses the uri a bit differently than camel-http-common base class     String scheme = entry.getProperties().get("protocol").     String host = entry.getProperties().get("host").     String port = entry.getProperties().get("port").     String path = entry.getProperties().get("path").     String baseUrl = scheme + "://" + host.     if (port != null) {         baseUrl += ":" + port.     }     return new String[] { baseUrl, path }. }
